column2: "Eso kaa wo Bɔfo wɔ wo mberantsɛber mu

column4: na ewunyamfo begyaa osiandɛ hɔnho esuar ntsi
column5: na hɔn a wodua atena ntokura mu hwɛ adze no hɔn enyiwa do bɛyɛ kusuww
column7: "na wɔatotow abɔntsen do mbobow no mu; ber a ewuyam ne dede abrɛ adze no. Wɔbɔsoɛr anoma no su ano
column8: na mbaa adwontofo nyinara wɔbɛbrɛ hɔn adze;"

column4: na ehuyi bɛba kwan mu; na almɔnd dua bɔbɔ nhyiren
column6: na akɔndɔ tun etwa: osiandɛ dasanyi rokɔ ne daa fie

column4: na ehina no abɔ nsubura ho

column2: "na dɛtse bɛsan akɔ asaase mu dɛ mbrɛ nkyɛ ɔtse
column3: na sunsum bɛsan akɔ Nyankopɔn a ɔdze mae no hɔ."
Ɔsɛnkafo no na ɔse; ne nyinara egyangyandze a."
osiandɛ Ɔsɛnkafo no ɔyɛ onyansafo ntsi
column4: ɔdaa ho ara kyerɛkyerɛɛ ɔman no nyimdzee; nyew

column2: "Ɔsɛnkafo no hwehwɛɛ dɛ obohu nsɛm a ɔyɛ enyigye
column3: na dza wɔakyerɛw no tɔɔtsenyɛ mu

column2: "Onyansafo ne nsɛm tse dɛ ɔnantwikafo ndadzepoma; na dɛ mbrɛ mprɛgow a wɔdze etsintsim yie tse no
column3: dɛmara so na nsɛm a ɔkandzifo kor na ɔka no tse."

column4: tsie afotu; nwoma pii ne yɛ nnyi ewiei; na nwomasua dodow pii so mu wɔ ɔhaw."
na dzi ne mbrasɛm do; na iyiara nye dza wɔrohwehwɛ efi nyimpa hɔ."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn dze dwumadzi biara bɛba asɛndzii
